医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
微生物学会欢迎有机会回应议会对这一流行病的调查微生物学会欢迎下议院科学技术委员会有机会回应有关新发疾病和从 COVID-19 中吸取的教训的询问。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Microbiology-society-welcomes-the-opportunity-to-respond-to-parliamentary-inquiry-on-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Microbiology-society-welcomes-the-opportunity-to-respond-to-parliamentary-inquiry-on-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25a1a58e-c6be-4dcb-a4d1-84631af4548d Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:18:31 -0400 Microbiology society welcomes the opportunity to respond to parliamentary inquiry on the pandemic
华盛顿大学医学院重申支持获得堕胎护理最高法院在多布斯诉杰克逊妇女健康组织案中的判决推翻了罗伊诉韦德案和计划生育诉凯西案，对全国医疗保健司法产生了重大影响，影响了全国许多人的健康、财务稳定和机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/UW-Medicine-reaffirms-support-for-access-to-abortion-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/UW-Medicine-reaffirms-support-for-access-to-abortion-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf733ed1-0560-4652-bdbf-b6c29f2274f5 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:09:44 -0400 UW Medicine reaffirms support for access to abortion care
UTHSC 药学院在 NIH 年度研究经费中排名第六根据美国药学院协会对其约 140 家成员机构发布的最新排名，田纳西大学健康科学中心药学院目前在美国国立卫生研究院年度研究经费方面排名第 6 位。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/UTHSC-College-of-Pharmacy-ranked-No-6-in-annual-research-funding-from-the-NIH.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/UTHSC-College-of-Pharmacy-ranked-No-6-in-annual-research-funding-from-the-NIH.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0746519-8ccc-48e6-a010-31f957d9124e Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:06:26 -0400 UTHSC College of Pharmacy ranked No. 6 in annual research funding from the NIH
新的 CHEST 指南提供了管理 COVID-19 中动脉血栓形成和血栓栓塞的建议美国胸科医师学会 (CHEST) 最近发布了关于 COVID-19 中动脉血栓形成和血栓栓塞的抗血栓治疗的新临床指南。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/New-CHEST-guideline-offers-recommendations-to-manage-arterial-thrombosis-and-thrombembolism-in-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/New-CHEST-guideline-offers-recommendations-to-manage-arterial-thrombosis-and-thrombembolism-in-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbdaa6fe-d17d-4ea3-8531-ab422aa30d9d Thu, 29 Jun 2023 14:03:34 -0400 New CHEST guideline offers recommendations to manage arterial thrombosis and thromboembolism in COVID-19
TOS 成员在 ADA 年会上公布有关抗肥胖药物的新研究在今年 6 月 23 日至 26 日举行的美国糖尿病协会 (ADA) 年会上，肥胖协会 (TOS) 的多名成员公布了有关几种正在开发的抗肥胖药物的新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/TOS-members-unveil-new-research-about-anti-obesity-medications-at-ADA-annual-meeting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/TOS-members-unveil-new-research-about-anti-obesity-medications-at-ADA-annual-meeting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b86af08-b8de-4482-87cc-65cc13846bbc Thu, 29 Jun 2023 13:54:54 -0400 TOS members unveil new research about anti-obesity medications at ADA annual meeting
新基因组技术如何使农业生产更加可持续欧盟委员会宣布发布新基因组技术 (NGT) 监管改革提案草案，预计将于 2023 年 7 月上旬发布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/How-New-Genomic-Techniques-can-make-agriculture-production-more-sustainable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/How-New-Genomic-Techniques-can-make-agriculture-product-more-sustainable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2916938-2c92-4369-b603-e90d2da56eae Thu, 29 Jun 2023 13:50:29 -0400 How New Genomic Techniques can make agricultural production more sustainable
杜克大学研究人员扩展了 CRISPR 基因编辑的功能CRISPR基因编辑是一项突破，已用于治疗镰状细胞性贫血、白血病和遗传性疾病等疾病，但它面临的挑战限制了其广泛应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Duke-researchers-expand-functionity-of-CRISPR-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Duke-researchers-expand-functionity-of-CRISPR-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39c36b08-5023-4459-94be-4b4222d18d59 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 13:34:21 -0400 Duke researchers expand functionality of CRISPR gene editing
清水断食的代谢益处可能是短暂的清水断食-；人们连续几天只喝水——；根据伊利诺伊大学芝加哥分校的研究，可能会帮助你减肥，但尚不清楚你能坚持多久。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Water-fastings-metabolic-benefits-may-be-short-lived.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Water-fastings-metabolic-benefits-may-be-short-lived.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a34eb833-791b-4535-8aea-5725a13923de Thu, 29 Jun 2023 13:29:19 -0400 Water fasting's metabolic benefits may be short-lived
IADR 公布 Journal of Dental Research 2 年期刊影响因子国际牙科、口腔和颅面研究协会和美国牙科、口腔和颅面研究协会宣布《Journal of Dental Research》(JDR) 2 年期刊影响因子™ 现已达到 7.6，在 91 种期刊中排名第 3 “牙科、口腔外科和医学”类别。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/IADR-announces-Journal-of-Dental-Research-2-Year-Journal-Impact-Factor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/IADR-announces-Journal-of-Dental-Research-2-Year-Journal-Impact-Factor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7015226d-c50a-4ef9-88cd-c932b7a38a0e Thu, 29 Jun 2023 13:27:08 -0400
天然分子可以添加到牙膏和漱口水中以改善牙齿卫生世界上大多数人要么长期患有牙菌斑和蛀牙，要么会在生命中的某个时刻出现这些问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Natural-molecule-could-be-added-to-toothpastes-and-mouthwashes-to-improve-dental-hygiene.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Natural-molecule-could-be-added-to-toothpastes-and-mouthwashes-to-improve-dental-hygiene.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1d8b9b9-1d50-4e40-a2d8-fd410fed3643 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 13:11:56 -0400 Natural molecule could be added to toothpastes and mouthwashes to improve dental hygiene
